lunchBreakDuration.description: Remove or set as "00:00" if you don't have an unpaid lunch break or if you normally log your lunch break hours

language.description: The language of the application. Currently supported languages are 'en', 'fi'

timestampFormat.description: Time format used to display timestamps (started, stopped, etc.). Refer to the dayjs documentation on how to set this https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format

stopTime.description: The time you stop working. Can either be 'now' or a time

workDayDuration.description: Disable prompt for work day duration if set to false

startTime.description: Disable prompt for start time if set to false

stopTime.description: Disable prompt for stop time if set to false

logged.description: Disable prompt for logged time if set to false

hadLunch.description: Assumed that you didn't have lunch if this is false

description: Work Time Calculator configuration file. Configuration file location: $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/wtc/config.toml, usually ~/.config/wtc/config.toml
